WorkItem.ClosedComment: We are unable to reproduce, a new version has been posted, user reports it started working later
WorkItem.Description:
I can reproduce this repeatedly. 
 
Browser: Google Chrome version 4.1.249.1042 (42199)
Silverlight version 3.0.50106.0
Windows 7 Ultimate x64. 
 
To repro: 
Attempting to 'Load from Armory' the character Mahkah, US-Black Dragonflight
 
 
[Async_ExceptionOccurred]
